document_data.name: Kallister
document_data.mainbody: '''Kallister Freeclaw''' was a brawler from [[Reithwin]], once a [[Sel√ªnite]] town in the [[Western Heartlands]], sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Kallister Freeclaw died sometime before the fall of Reithwin and its consumption by the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]], before the {{Yearlink|1374}}. Kallister was said to have been a legendary brawler who died in his sleep. He was buried in Reithwin's graveyard behind the [[House of Healing]], at its very edge. His tombstone read: "Here rests Kallister Freeclaw, legendary brawler. Died in his sleep, to the surprise of many." The grave marker remained undamaged as of the {{Yearlink|1492}}.
